author: aat127
title: Very fragile and frustrating set
review: as a parent and AFOL this was one of the worst sets. Overall dissatisfaction and disappointment with the whole Mario experience.  I feel Lego is trying to capitalise on nostalgia with poorly designed sets. Only a few studs hold every thing together. Very little playability. Yes the sets can be rearranged and  rebuilt but nothing really lines up.
